item.wearablebackpacks.backpack.name: Backpack
tooltip.wearablebackpacks.equipHint: Place down and break\nwhile sneaking to equip.
tooltip.wearablebackpacks.equipHint.exte: Sneak and break to equip.\nSneak and right click ground\nwith empty hand to unequip.
tooltip.wearablebackpacks.unequipHint: Sneak and right click ground\nwith empty hand to unequip.
tooltip.wearablebackpacks.used: Currently being used by a player.
chat.wearablebackpacks.cantEquip: You already have a backpack equipped.
chat.wearablebackpacks.cantEquip.chestpl: You can't equip a backpack while wearing a chestplate.
config.wearablebackpacks.general.equipAs: Controls whether equipped backpacks take up the chest armor equipment slot.
config.wearablebackpacks.general.enableE: Controls whether players can access equipped backpacks on other players (and entities).
config.wearablebackpacks.general.enableS: Controls whether players can access their own equipped backpack using a keybind.
config.wearablebackpacks.general.enableM: Controls whether machines (such as hoppers) can interact with placed backpacks.
config.wearablebackpacks.general.dropAsB: Controls whether backpacks place themselves down upon death, instead of scattering their contents.
Setting "%1$s" is required for this setting.
config.wearablebackpacks.general.status.chestplate=No effect if not equipped as armor. [general.equipAsChestArmor = false]
config.wearablebackpacks.backpack.enable: Controls whether the regular backpack is enabled.
config.wearablebackpacks.backpack.durabi: Controls the durability of the regular backpack (0 for unbreakable).
config.wearablebackpacks.backpack.size.t: Controls the storage size of regular backpacks. Does not affect currently placed or equipped backpacks, turn them back into an item to apply changes.
config.wearablebackpacks.category.entity: Controls settings regarding entities wearing backpacks
config.wearablebackpacks.entity.spawnNat: Controls whether mobs spawned naturally can randomly be wearing backpacks
config.wearablebackpacks.entity.spawnFro: Controls whether mobs spawned from spawners can randomly be wearing backpacks
config.wearablebackpacks.entity.entityID: Internal identifier of the entity, such as "minecraft:zombie".
config.wearablebackpacks.entity.renderOp: Controls the position, rotation and scale of the backpack on this entity.
config.wearablebackpacks.entity.chance:
Chance
config.wearablebackpacks.entity.chance.tooltip=Chance of 1 in X that an entity spawns with this backpack (100 = 1%%, 1000 = 0.1%%). Set to 0 to disable.
config.wearablebackpacks.entity.backpack: Item ID of the backpack to spawn on the entity.
config.wearablebackpacks.entity.lootTabl: ID of the loot table used to fill this backpack.
config.wearablebackpacks.entity.translat: Controls the render position of the backpack on this entity
config.wearablebackpacks.entity.rotate.t: Controls the render rotation of the backpack on this entity
config.wearablebackpacks.entity.scale.to: Controls the render scale (size) of the backpack on this entity
config.wearablebackpacks.entity.status.e: The specified entity couldn't be found. Entry will be ignored.
config.wearablebackpacks.category.cosmet: Controls cosmetic (client only) settings that don't affect gameplay.
config.wearablebackpacks.cosmetic.enchan: Controls the opacity / visibility of the enchantment effect on equipped and placed backpacks, if present.
config.wearablebackpacks.backpack.durabi: No effect if not equipped as armor.
No effect if not equipped as armor.
